commands.tooltip: run knex migrations in docker container
commands.command: docker exec node-boilerplate-app_node_1 node node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:latest

commands.tooltip: run knex seeds in docker container
commands.command: docker exec node-boilerplate-app_node_1 node node_modules/.bin/knex seed:run

commands.tooltip: run codecept tests in docker container
commands.command: docker exec node-boilerplate-app_node_1 npm run test:cept

commands.tooltip: run mocha api tests in docker container
commands.command: docker exec node-boilerplate-app_node_1 npm run test:api

commands.tooltip: run mocha unit tests in docker container
commands.command: docker exec node-boilerplate-app_node_1 npm run test:unit
